body.description: Time for a water drop! The Green Toys Fire Plane brings scoop-and-soar fun to a whole new level and is the perfect complement to any bathtub fleet Using the handle on the back of the body scoop in water through the front of the plane then fly it high as water streams out from the back and bottom With a wide wingspan yet lightweight design this aircraft is great for little ones and big kids alike When the mission is complete flip down the door on the bottom to clean inside with a bottle brush or put the whole vessel in the dishwasher Made in the USA from 100% recycled plastic with no BPA phthalates or PVC Packaged with recycled and recyclable materials printed with inks

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Green Toys Fire Plane Fun, Safe, and Way Good for the Earth! Time for a water drop! The Green Toys Fire Plane brings scoop-and-soar fun to a whole new level, and is the perfect complement to any bathtub fleet. Helps practice development areas like motor skills, narrative play, and prosocial behaviors. Made in the USA from 100% recycled plastic with no BPA, phthalates, or PVC. Packaged with recycled and recyclable materials. Imaginative Play and Learning Fun Using the handle on the back of the body, scoop in water through the front of the plane, then fly it high as water streams out from the back and bottom. With a wide wingspan yet lightweight design, this aircraft is great for little ones and big kids alike. When the mission is complete, flip down the door on the bottom to clean inside with a bottle brush, or put the whole vessel in the dishwasher. Classic Toys with an Eco Twist This is not your typical toy plane. Manufactured and assembled in the USA, it’s made from 100% post consumer recycled plastic milk jugs (HDPE #2 plastic) that save energy and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. With no external coatings, paints, or dyes, this super-safe, durable toy is good for the earth and safe and fun for little ones. At a Glance Ages 6 months to 6 years Ready to play indoors or out Made in the USA from 100% recycled milk jugs Study, well-designed and loaded with Good Green Fun! Encourages development of gross and fine motor skills Phthalate and BPA free Easy to clean – can even go in the dishwasher Phthalate and BPA free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: These are hand-me-down generational quality toys! These Green Toys are absolutely the best, hands down! What's not to love? The minute you recieve one you realize the substantial and durable quality of them. They are easy to clean and I literally can not fathom any saftey hazards whatsoever with these toys (other than if the are used as a projectile, but that is the case with most toys that are not fabric, so obviously if there is a baby in the bunch with some older toddlers or so, you should still have your eyes on the kids). I love that they are all dishwasher safe for sterilizing. We have decided to keep all the Green Toys in a toy box in our main livingroom for 2 reasons. When we have company with children or playmates visiting, they can all just dive into these toys and we don't have the aggravation of my grandson's other toys being dragged out with multiple pieces, and those are not all small child safe, and we can not just throw them in the dishwasher afterwards as we can these. These are literally worry free toys when children are visiting (other than the aforementioned throwing, or maybe banging over the head, so yes you still must parent as we should be anyway). Second, after dinner, when there is just a small window of time for bath and playtime before bed, these are hassle free and the only toys we let him drag out because they are simple and easy pickup. BONUS, they are MADE IN THE USA, and of completely recycled materials. I have not seen that many quality toys like these other than ones made in the 1940's or so, where good craftsmanship (as these are) mattered, even in a toy. We have at least 2 dozen of these toys and they have become an awesome gift item especially when they go on sale, which is often. They are literally the PERFECT toys!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it so much we got it twice
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old loves this, we actually ended up getting it for a friend from their birthday. Great quality and house of open play fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solved my moldy bath toy problem
reviews.reviewText: We love Green Toys! Especially for the bath as they are so easy to clean. I was getting tired of throwing out moldy squirt toys and this was just what I was looking for. The design is so simple, but still lots of fun. I love that the propellers actually turn when you move it over the water. We have a submarine toy from this company as well and it is equally great. I hang them upside down in a mesh bag after each bath and they dry out quickly and do not get moldy! The quality is great too, I can see these lasting for a very long time. I also love that they are made out of recycled milk jugs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, simple, awesome, made in USA
reviews.reviewText: Love these toys! Simple and sturdy like old fashioned toys used to be, but with the fresh look and colors, plus little details that the old toys didn't have! Big bonus things for me are that they are made from recycled materials and made in the USA! It just doesn't get any better. I was just admiring it on the floor outside the bathtub thinking how cool the design was and how my sons like having a plane they can play with in the bath. Cool handle and pour spout "designed" in!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great water toy
reviews.reviewText: Picked this up for the 2-year-old grandson. Also picked up the submarine. It's a very simple constructed toy. Boys of this age are the ultimate in testing the destructibility of toys. He enjoys playing with the plane in and out of the water. It's been given the bam-bam test repeatedly and so far, it's holding up well. It's easy to clean and there hasn't been any slimy mold growth. Hope to use it in the pool this summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Niece loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun toy for in or out of the bath
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our 2-year-old for Christmas because she noticed and got happy whenever an airplane flies overhead. She loved it and ended up using it in the bathtub most of the time. It's a solid toy other than the back hatch, which she somehow managed to get undone at the hinge and the release tab jammed inside—not once, but twice. We had a hard time fixing it both times. As I was trying to pry it out, the tab felt flimsy like it was going to break.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made well, made in the USA...fun and good looking.
reviews.reviewText: It was exactly what I was hoping for as a gift to my almost 2year old son. I made a strong effort to only buy Christmas gifts made in the United States this past year. Tough finding age appropriate toys made in US for his. This toy nailed it. I really like the simplicity of the box as well.I went ahead and bought him the car carrier that Green Toys makes for his birthday (next week). I will continue to buy these.
Ottimo prodotto, bellissima plastica riciclata. Bimbo molto molto felice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: A quality made toy of a good size. Grandson loves it.

Il prodotto è appena arrivato e sembra davvero ben fatto... peccato che non abbia la scatola e che quindi sia usato! È arrivato nella sola scatola amazon con pochissima carta per evitare che si muovesse (come si vede in foto).Avrei dato 5 stelle, ma io pago per un prodotto nuovo...
